metadata.title: CVE-2019-11703 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw in Thunderbird's implementation of iCal causes a heap bufferoverflow in parser_get_next_char when processing certain email messages,resulting in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affectsThunderbird < 60.7.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
